I grew up in Kenora. My high school hotel lifeguard job included keeping the black bears away from the dumpster. I opened the back door, sprayed them with a hose. They ran away, I went back inside. No gun required.

That's how we do it in The North.

But thanks for the laugh. https://t.co/NuwIpZy7IP
